extension.name: Mosaico
extension.description: Integration with mosaico templates builder. Allows building civi message templates using mosaico template builder.
extension.comments: To help contribute please contact us on support@vedaconsulting.co.uk or initiate a conversation / issue on github. Systopia version with added functionality for menu entries. See https://github.com/pbatroff/uk.co.vedaconsulting.mosaico/tree/HBS-6439
